title: Leveraging digital channels, tech to become $5 trillion economy welcome step by govt: HUL CMD Sanjiv Mehta - Economic Times
content: Leveraging digital channels, tech to become $5 trillion economy welcome step by govt: HUL CMD Sanjiv Mehta  Economic Times
description: While referring to the recent Union Budget, Mehta said ubiquity of technology and the need for mainstreaming it for the greater good was "amply evident" in the speech of Finance Minister Nirmala Sitharaman.
